comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: Ross Emil Erwin Bats Left, Throws Right Height 6' 0", Weight 185 lb. Debut August 26, 1907 Final Game July 23, 1914 Born December 22, 1885 in Forney, TX www.baseball-reference.com/e/erwinte01.shtml Aug 3,1911 - Against the Cubs, visiting Brooklyn gets three homers in the 5th inning as Eddie Zimmerman, Tex Erwin, and Zack Wheat connect, not consecutively, in the 5 - 3 win. Zim's and Erwin's come against Lurid Lew Richie, while Fred Toney serves up Wheat. The trio will total six homers on the year, bu got three of them in this one inning.
